p: It was, therefore concluded that the Si@PAA- g-PEG electrode had a relatively low lithiation capacity because of the low electrolyte uptake of this binder (PAA- g-PEG), which limits the activation of the active material in its initial cycle. The Si@PAU- g-PEG electrode, with its high electrolyte update, had a high lithiation capacity (Fig.Â 4c).
